description:
Call off the search party; CouponCabin.com has a single, easy-to-use coupon app that does it all! With help from our app, you can save money at all of your favorite stores and brands at home or on-the-go. No matter what you’re shopping for, we can find a discount for you. CouponCabin.com’s iPhone and iPad app has constantly updated savings of every type including:

· Coupon codes for online stores
· Coupons you can print or download to use in-stores
· Grocery coupons
· Freebies
· Daily deals 
· Local deals and cheap gas prices nearby
  
But that’s not all! With My Coupon Camera and My Loyalty Cards, you can also use the CouponCabin app to convert your paper coupons and loyalty cards into digital versions that go with you everywhere and can be easily scanned at checkout! We’ll also send you notification when you’re near a store or mall with coupons or when a coupon you’ve saved is about to expire. 

Download the CouponCabin iPad or iPhone app to start saving, no matter where or how you shop. You’ll never miss a great deal again!

Features:
· Browse or search for offers from over 4,000 stores and brands
· Find exclusive coupons you won’t get anywhere else
· Be the first to find out about new coupons and deals from CouponCabin Newsflash
· Mark stores and coupons as ”favorites” for quick access later
· Share deals with friends or email them to yourself to use later
· Set calendar reminders so you know when coupons expire 
· Find the best deals and cheapest gas prices nearby
· Scan and store paper coupons and loyalty cards for easy access on your device
· Sync your data across multiple devices using iCloud 
· Notifications when a store that you have a saved coupon or loyalty card for is nearby – NEW
· Notifications when you’re shopping in a mall and we have active in-store coupons you can use – NEW
· Alerts when a coupon you’ve marked as a favorite or stored using My Coupon Camera is close to expiring - NEW

*Note, for iPad users, My Coupon Camera and My Loyalty Card, features are compatible with iPad 2 and higher.
releaseNotes:
With this update we’ve added 3 types of notifications to make sure that you never miss a deal again! 

· Store Notifications - alerts when a store that you've saved coupon or loyalty card for is nearby
· Mall Notifications - coupon alerts when you're shopping in your favorite malls
· Expiring Coupon Notifications - alerts when a coupon you’ve marked as a favorite or stored using My Coupon Camera is about to expire

You can manage all your notifications settings from the app by swiping to the left on the homescreen and tapping on the Notifications icon. 

Enjoy!
